channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: CrowdStrike stock could see its worst day ever after worldwide outages
item.description: CrowdStrike Holdings may be looking at worst single-day stock-market performance ever, after a computer outage worldwide was pinned on the cybersecurity company.

item.title: Flights grounded and passengers warned of delays amid global IT outage
item.description: A slew of airlines said operations would be impacted on one of the busiest flight days of the year.

item.title: CrowdStrike shares tank 15% in premarket after major outage hits businesses worldwide
item.description: Cybersecurity firm CrowdStrike saw its shares plunge Friday in premarket trading, after an update led to a major outage, impacting businesses globally.

item.title: Trump RNC speech details assassination attempt: 'I'm not supposed to be here tonight'
item.description: Trump only mentioned President Joe Biden by name a few times ‚Äî a striking shift away from the personal attacks that typically pepper his political speeches.

item.title: CrowdStrike says global IT outage not a cyberattack, fix deployed for defect: Live updates
item.description: A major IT outage has grounded planes and sent broadcasters off air.

item.title: Second Democratic senator urges Biden to drop out of election against Trump
item.description: President Joe Biden to date has flatly rejected calls to exit the 2024 election contest against Donald Trump.

item.title: Flights grounded and passengers warned of delays amid global IT outage
item.description: A slew of airlines said operations would be impacted on one of the busiest flight days of the year.

item.title: The market has wobbled. Why one firm just increased its S&P 500 target
item.description: Stocks have had a wobble but UBS reckons the bull market has further to run

item.title: Trump doesn't plan to mention Biden by name in RNC acceptance speech: report
item.description: Donald Trump is accepting the Republican nomination more than three years after leaving the White House and days after an attempted assassination.

item.title: CrowdStrike issue causes major outage affecting businesses around the world
item.description: An update by cybersecurity firm CrowdStrike led to a major IT outage on Friday, impacting businesses around the world.

item.title: Airlines grounded, companies experiencing outages tied to CrowdStrike issue
item.description: Major airlines grounded flights and companies globally were experiencing IT outages, believed to be caused by a CrowdStrike cybersecurity platform issue on Friday.

item.title: What happens next if Biden drops out of the presidential race
item.description: Biden's campaign crisis has put a spotlight on Vice President Kamala Harris, who is widely viewed as the likeliest choice to replace him.

item.title: Microsoft users hit with 'blue screen of death' after massive outage
item.description: Microsoft users around the world are experiencing an error screen known as the "blue screen of death," as widespread tech outages persist.
